description: The Union Cabinet under the Chairmanship of Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi has given approval for a special package for employment generation and promotion of exports in Textile and Apparel sector.
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Special package approved by the Cabinet today pertaining to textile & apparel sector will boost youth employment, manufacturing & exports. 

Farmers have a very strong link with the textile sector. The package will further lead to value addition of agro products & help farmers. The package is labour friendly & women will greatly benefit from it. It is a step for #TransformingIndia. http://nm-4.com/cqkr
